member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Paint,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc with the specified paint. This is a helper method for when filling an arc with a gradient, so that you don't need to worry about calculating the gradient handle locations based on the rectangle size and location.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.DrawArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the arc. This is a helper method to draw an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc
If the arc is closed or not

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.DrawArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Rect,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the arc. This is a helper method to draw an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc
If the arc is closed or not

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc. This is a helper method to fill an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Rect,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc. This is a helper method to fill an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.EnableDefaultShadow(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,System.Single)
member.summary: Enables the default shadow.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.ResetStroke(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas)
member.summary: Resets the stroke to the default settings: - Stroke Size: 1 - Stroke Dash Pattern: None - Stroke Location: Center - Stroke Line Join: Miter - Stroke Line Cap: Butt - Stroke Brush: None - Stroke Color: Black

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.GeometryUtil.EllipseAngleToPoint(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the point on an ellipse that corresponds to the given angle.
member.param: The x position of the bounding rectangle.
The y position of the bounding rectangle.
The width of the bounding rectangle.
The height of the bounding rectangle.

members.member: Return true if c is between a and b.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas
member.summary: Represents a platform-agnostic canvas on which 2D graphics can be drawn using types from the namespace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.DisplayScale
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that represents the scaling factor to scale the UI by.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeSize
member.summary: Sets the width of the stroke used to draw an object's outline.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.MiterLimit
member.summary: Sets the limit of the miter length of line joins in an object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeColor
member.summary: Sets the used to paint an object's outline.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeLineCap
member.summary: Sets the shape at the start and end of a line.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeLineJoin
member.summary: Sets the type of join used at the vertices of a shape.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeDashPattern
member.summary: Sets the pattern of dashes and gaps that are used to outline an object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.StrokeDashOffset
member.summary: Sets the distance within the dash pattern where a dash begins.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.FillColor
member.summary: Sets the color used to paint an object's interior.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.FontColor
member.summary: Sets the font color when drawing text.

member.summary: Sets the font used when drawing text.

member.summary: Sets the size of the font used when drawing text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Alpha
member.summary: Sets the opacity of am object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Antialias
member.summary: Sets a value that indicates whether to use anti-aliasing is enabled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.BlendMode
member.summary: Sets the blend mode, which determines what happens when an object is rendered on top of an existing object.

Fill algorithm used for the path. Default is .

The angle from the x-axis to the end point of the arc.
to draw the arc in a clockwise direction; to draw the arc counterclockwise.
to specify whether the end point of the arc will be connected to the start point; otherwise.

Starting y coordinate of the bounding box.
Horizontal alignment options to align the string within the bounding box.

Specifies whether text will be clipped in case it overflows the bounding box. Default is .
Spacing adjustment between lines. Default is 0.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Rotate(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates a graphical object around a point.
member.remarks: Rotation is clockwise for increasing angles. Negative angles and angles greater than 360 are allowed.
member.param: x coordinate of the rotation point.
y coordinate of the rotation point.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Rotate(System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates a graphical object around the upper-left corner of the canvas (0,0).
member.remarks: Rotation is clockwise for increasing angles. Negative angles and angles greater than 360 are allowed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Scale(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Changes the size of a graphical object by scaling it.
member.remarks: Can cause starting coordinates to move when an object is made larger.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.Translate(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Shifts a graphical object in horizontal and vertical directions.
member.param: Horizontal shift. Negative values move the object to the left, while positive values move it to the right.
Vertical shift. Negative values move the object down, while positive values move it up.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.ConcatenateTransform(System.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Applies transformation specified by to a graphical object.

member.summary: Saves the current graphics state.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.RestoreState
member.summary: Restores the graphics state to the most recently saved state.
member.returns: if the restore was succesful, otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas.ResetState
member.summary: Resets the graphics state to its default values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Matrix3x2Extensions.CreateMatrix3x2(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Single,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a matrix from an SRT.
member.remarks:
This is equivalent to:
m = Matrix3x2.CreateScale(scale)
m *= Matri3x2.CreateRotation(rotation)
m *= Matri3x2.CreateTranslation(translation)

members.member: Converts a svg arc specification to a Degrafa arc.
Draws an arc of type "open" only. Accepts an optional x axis rotation value

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Platform.PlatformImage.Save(System.IO.Stream,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ImageFormat,System.Single)
member.summary: Saves the contents of this image to the provided object.
member.param: The destination stream the bytes of this image will be saved to.
The destination format of the image.
The destination quality of the image.
member.exception: Thrown when is less than 0 or more than 1.
Thrown when the provided value in does not match with the original format for this image.
